title: ArAindu pAr
sahitya:
ArAindu pAr manidA �nAn yAr� enrE


anupallavi

  pUrAyamAga uTporuL �adu� eduvenrE


caraNam 1    kaNNil irundulagaik-kANbad-eduvenrE
    caraNam 2    nAvilirundu shuvai nayappavan yArenrE
    caraNam 3    uLlattilE oLinda uNmai eduvenrE
    caraNam 4    idayattil tuDittiDum inbam eduvenrE
    caraNam 5    arivum ariporuLum arivOnum yArenrE
    caraNam 6    uyirkkuyirAik-kalanda uttaman evanenrE
